text: An orange soda cocktail is a cocktail made with orange soda and other ingredients. ==Examples== ===Hard orange sodas made by the brewer=== Coney Island Brewing Co. has sold a hard orange cream ale, and Henry's Hard Soda has sold a Henry's Hard Orange Soda. ===Duos=== *Campari and orange soda *Royal hard orange cream soda (Crown Royal vanilla, orange soda) ===Trios=== *Blood orange spritzer (vodka, lemon juice, blood orange soda) *Cosmic collision (white beer, triple sec, orange soda) *Creamsicle (vodka, whipped cream vodka, orange soda) *Orange Fanta-sy (spiced rum, orange juice, orange soda) ===Other=== *Blood Orange Paloma (tequila, lime juice, agave, blood orange soda) *Holiday rum punch (spiced rum, orange juice, pomegranate juice, club soda, orange soda) *Fizzy Old Fashioned (bourbon, lemon, bitters, blood orange soda) *Sunrise beer margarita (white tequila, beer, salt, sugar, frozen limeade concentrate, orange soda) ==References== Category:Cocktails with orange soda
title: Orange soda cocktail
